titlealts.searchtitle: Data Element: OTHER GENE OR STRATIFICATION BIOMARKER TYPE ANALYSED COMMENT - Description

body.p: OTHER GENE OR STRATIFICATION BIOMARKER TYPE ANALYSED COMMENT is the same as attribute CLINICAL INTERVENTION TEXT STRING .

OTHER GENE OR STRATIFICATION BIOMARKER TYPE ANALYSED COMMENT is free text to specify the Gene or Stratification Biomarker that was analysed, where GENE_OR_STRATIFICATION_BIOMARKER_TYPE_ANALYSED is National Code 'Other (not listed)' .
